name: Canvas The Gallery (itch)
description:
Get the game on Steam!

In canvas the gallery, you are given an empty gallery, a spray can and let loose. You can paint whatever you want, and people will come and view your drawings. Share your galleries with your friends, or upload your own pictures and have them shown in your gallery.

With the optional Artist Pack, you unlock all stencils!

The song featured in the game is Etude Op. 25 by Chopin

Controls:

  • WASD-Move
  • Left mouse-Paint
  • Middle mouse-Change stencil size
  • Hold Tab/Space-Change color or stencil
  • Escape-Menu

All of your textures are saved into MyDocuments\\CanvasTheGallery as .pngs. I would love to see your pictures and screenshots of the game! Feel free to message me and I can include them as a screenshot for the game. You can use any textures you create in game for commercial purposes, no credit required.

http://canvasthegallery.com

Follow me on twitter!

Note:

If you would like to see a mac or linux build and are willing to give it a test, lemme know!
